description: Enterprise techniques used by Defacement Mitigation, ATT&CK mitigation T1491 v1.0
name: Defacement Mitigation (T1491)

techniques.comment: Consider implementing IT disaster recovery plans that contain procedures for taking regular data backups that can be used to restore organizational data.(Citation: Ready.gov IT DRP) Ensure backups are stored off system and is protected from common methods adversaries may use to gain access and destroy the backups to prevent recovery.
